item.title: [Updated] [Live] Things Google Gemini Can't Do
item.description: Newly discovered: Google Gemini can't search images like Assistant can.

item.title: [Updated] [Live] Stupid Linux Garbage
item.description: Today, I learned that sometimes KDE will forget your user is an "Administrator" if you change Polkit rules.

item.title: [Updated] [Live] Stupid Linux Garbage
item.description: Sometimes I forget all the places I should check for cache files when cleaning up my computer, so I wrote 'em all down.

item.title: [New] [Live] Things Google Gemini Can't Do
item.description: Google claims it wants to replace its existing, mature, and very well designed Google Assistant with the LLM Google Gemini. I wanted to see if the transition would be simple and smooth. Here's where it flopped.

item.title: Albums I've Been About
item.description: Wanna write something short. Been listening to music at a new job. Here's what's been on repeat for me.
